sentences.text: March 17, 2017
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Dear Stockholder:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: It is my pleasure to invite you to attend the Companys 2017 Annual Meeting of Stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The meeting will be held on Tuesday, April 25, 2017, at 2:00 p.m. local time at the FMC Tower at Cira Centre South, 2929 Walnut Street, 24th Floor, Philadelphia, Pennsylvania.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Notice of Annual Meeting and Proxy Statement accompanying this letter describe the business to be conducted at the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: During the meeting, I will report to you on the Companys earnings, results and other achievements during 2016 and on our outlook for 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We welcome this opportunity to have a dialogue with our stockholders and look forward to your comments and questions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Your vote is important.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Please vote your proxy promptly so your shares can be represented.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Please see your proxy card for specific instructions on how to vote.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you plan to attend the meeting, please send written notification to the Companys Investor Relations Department, FMC Tower at Cira Centre South, 2929 Walnut Street, Philadelphia, Pennsylvania 19104, so that your name can be put on an admission list held at the registration desk at the entrance to the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If your shares are held by a bank, broker or other intermediary and you plan to attend, you must enclose with your notification evidence of your ownership, such as a letter from the bank, broker or intermediary confirming your ownership or a bank or brokerage firm account statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you wish to vote at the meeting, please refer to the section of this proxy statement entitled How to Vote for specific instructions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: I look forward to seeing you on April 25th.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Sincerely,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Pierre Brondeau President, Chief Executive Officer and Chairman of the Board
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Dear Stockholder:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You are invited to the Annual Meeting of Stockholders of FMC Corporation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We will hold the meeting at the time and place noted above.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: At the meeting, we will ask you to:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 1. Elect eleven directors, each for a term of one year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2. Ratify the appointment of KPMG LLP as our independent registered public accounting firm for 2017
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 3. Hold an advisory (non-binding) vote on executive compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 4. Hold an advisory (non-binding) vote on the frequency of executive compensation voting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 5. Approve an Amendment to the FMC Corporation Incentive Compensation and Stock Plan
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 6. Consider and act upon any other business properly brought before the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: THE BOARD RECOMMENDS A VOTE FOR ITS NOMINEES FOR DIRECTOR AND FOR PROPOSALS 2, 3 AND 5.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: THE BOARD RECOMMENDS A VOTE IN FAVOR OF A FREQUENCY OF ONE YEAR IN PROPOSAL 4.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Your vote is important.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To be sure your vote counts and assure a quorum, please vote, sign, date and return the enclosed proxy card whether or not you plan to attend the meeting; or if you prefer, please follow the instructions on the enclosed proxy card for voting by Internet or by telephone whether or not you plan to attend the meeting in person.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: I. INFORMATION ABOUT VOTING
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Solicitation of Proxies
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board of Directors of FMC Corporation (the Company or FMC) is soliciting proxies for use at the Companys 2017 Annual Meeting of Stockholders and any postponements or adjournments of that meeting (as so postponed or adjourned, the 2017 Annual Meeting or the Annual Meeting).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Company first mailed this proxy statement, the accompanying form of proxy and the Companys Annual Report for 2016 on or about March 17, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Agenda Items
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The agenda for the Annual Meeting is to:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 1. Elect eleven directors;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2. Ratify the appointment of KPMG LLP as the Companys independent registered public accounting firm for 2017;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 3. Hold an advisory (non-binding) vote on executive compensation;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 4. Hold an advisory (non-binding) vote on the frequency of executive compensation voting;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 5. Approval of Amendment and Restatement of the FMC Corporation Incentive Compensation and Stock Plan; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 6. Conduct other business properly brought before the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Who Can Vote
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You can vote at the Annual Meeting if you are a holder of the Companys common stock, par value of $0.10 per share (Common Stock), on the record date.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The record date is the close of business on February 28, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You will have one vote for each share of Common Stock.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As of February 28, 2017, there were 133,826,580 shares of Common Stock outstanding.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How to Vote
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may vote in one of four ways:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You can vote by signing and returning the enclosed proxy card.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you do, the individuals named on the card will vote your shares in the way you indicate;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You can vote by Internet;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You can vote by telephone; or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You can cast your vote at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you plan to cast your vote at the meeting, please send written notification to the Companys Investor Relations Department, FMC Tower at Cira Centre South, 2929 Walnut Street, Philadelphia, PA, 19104, so that your name can be put on an admission list held at the registration desk at the entrance to the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, if you hold your shares through a broker, bank or other intermediary and you wish to vote at the Annual Meeting, you must obtain a legal proxy from them authorizing you to vote at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We will be unable to accept a vote from you at the Annual Meeting without that authorization.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are a registered stockholder and wish to vote at the Annual Meeting, in addition to the above attendance notification, you must provide proper identification as the stockholder of record at the registration desk, but no additional authorization will be required in order to cast your vote.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Use of Proxies
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Unless you tell us on the proxy card to vote differently, we plan to vote signed and returned proxies FOR the Board nominees for director, FOR Proposals 2, 3 and 5, and FOR a frequency of one year for Proposal 4, and in the discretion of the proxy holders as to any other matters that may properly come before the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Quorum Requirement
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We need a quorum of stockholders to hold a valid Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A quorum will be present if the holders of at least a majority of the outstanding Common Stock entitled to vote at the meeting either attend the Annual Meeting in person or are represented by proxy at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Abstentions, broker non-votes (described below) and votes withheld are counted as present for the purpose of establishing a quorum.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: FMC CORPORATION - Notice of Annual Meeting of Stockholders and Proxy Statement     5
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Back to Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Vote Required for Action
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Directors are elected by a majority of the votes cast in an uncontested election.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Because the number of nominees properly nominated for the Annual Meeting is the same as the number of directors to be elected at the Annual Meeting, the election of directors is an uncontested election.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As a result, any nominee who receives a majority of the votes cast with respect to his or her election at the Annual Meeting will be elected to the Board (or re-elected, in the case of any nominee who is an incumbent director).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Incumbent nominees have tendered a contingent resignation which would become effective if
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) the nominee does not receive a majority of the votes cast with respect to his or her election at the Annual Meeting and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) the Board of Directors accepts such resignation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Adoption of Proposals 2 through 5 require the affirmative vote of the majority of shares present in person or represented by proxy and entitled to vote at the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Abstentions or Lack of Instructions to Banks, Brokers, or Employee Benefit Plan Trustees
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Abstentions will not be counted as votes cast for the election of directors, and thus will have no effect on the election of directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: With respect to Proposals 2 through 5, abstentions will have the effect of a vote against such proposals.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A broker non-vote occurs when a bank, broker or other nominee holding shares on behalf of a stockholder does not receive voting instructions from the beneficial owner with respect to a non-routine matter to be voted on at the Annual Meeting by a specified date before the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Banks, brokers and other nominees may vote undirected shares on matters deemed routine in accordance with New York Stock Exchange rules, but they may not vote undirected shares on matters deemed non-routine in accordance with such rules.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For this purpose, the ratification of the appointment of the independent registered public accounting firm is considered a routine matter, but the election of directors, the advisory vote regarding executive compensation, the advisory vote regarding the frequency of executive compensation voting, and the approval of the Amendment to the FMC Corporation Incentive Compensation and Stock Plan are considered non-routine matters.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In the event of a broker non-vote in the election of directors or with respect to Proposals 2 through 5 at the Annual Meeting, the broker non-vote will not have any effect on the outcome inasmuch as broker non-votes are not counted as votes cast or as shares present and entitled to be voted with respect to any matter on which the broker has expressly not voted.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are entitled to vote shares held under an employee benefit plan and you either do not direct the trustee by April 21, 2017 how to vote your shares, or if you vote on some but not all matters that come before the Annual Meeting, the trustee will, in the case of shares held in the FMC Corporation Savings and Investment Plan, vote your undirected shares in proportion to the votes received from other participants, and in the case of the Companys other employee plans, vote your shares in the trustees discretion, except to the extent that the plan or applicable law provides otherwise.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Revoking a Proxy
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may revoke your proxy at any time before it is exercised.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You can revoke a proxy by:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Sending a written notice to the Corporate Secretary of FMC;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Delivering a properly executed, later-dated proxy;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Attending the Annual Meeting and voting in person, provided that you comply with the conditions set forth in the section of this proxy statement above entitled How to Vote; or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If your shares are held through an employee benefit plan, your revocation must be received by the trustee by April 21, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: FMC CORPORATION - Notice of Annual Meeting of Stockholders and Proxy Statement     6
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Back to Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: II.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: THE PROPOSALS TO BE VOTED ON
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proposal 1 Election of Directors
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Nominees for Director
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board of Directors consists of 11 directors, each of whom is elected to serve for a term of one year, expiring at the subsequent annual meeting of stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The nominees for director this year are Pierre Brondeau, Eduardo E. Cordeiro, G. Peter DAloia, C. Scott Greer, KLynne Johnson, Dirk A. Kempthorne, Paul J. Norris, Robert C. Pallash, William H. Powell, and Vincent R. Volpe, Jr., each of whom is an incumbent director, and Margareth vrum, who was appointed to the Board of Directors in 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If elected, these directors next term will expire at the 2018 Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Information about the nominees is contained in the section of this proxy statement entitled Board of Directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board of Directors expects that all of the nominees will be able and willing to serve as directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If any nominee becomes unavailable, the proxies may be voted for another person nominated by the Board of Directors to fill the vacancy, or the size of the Board of Directors may be reduced.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board of Directors recommends a vote FOR the election of Pierre Brondeau, Eduardo E. Cordeiro, G. Peter DAloia, C. Scott Greer, KLynne Johnson, Dirk A. Kempthorne, Paul J. Norris, Margareth vrum, Robert C. Pallash, William H. Powell and Vincent R. Volpe, Jr. to the Board of Directors as described above.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proposal 2 Ratification of Appointment of Independent Registered Public Accounting Firm
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee of the Board of Directors is directly responsible for the appointment, compensation, retention and oversight of the independent external audit firm retained to audit the Companys financial statements.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee has approved KPMG LLP (KPMG) continuing to serve as the Companys independent registered public accounting firm for 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee periodically reviews the performance of the independent external audit firm.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In conjunction with the mandated rotation of KPMGs lead engagement partner, the Audit Committee and its chairperson also evaluate and approve the selection of KPMGs new lead engagement partner.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee is responsible for the audit fee negotiations associated with the Companys retention of KPMG.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For the years 2015 and 2016, KPMGs fees, all of which were approved by the Audit Committee, were as follows:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: ($000)     2016     2015  Audit Fees(1)     7,658     7,884  Audit Related Fees(2)     232     921  Tax Fees(3)     755     752  All Other Fees(4)     536     455  TOTAL     9,181     10,012
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (1) Fees for professional services performed by KPMG for the integrated audit of the Companys annual consolidated financial statements included in the Companys Form 10- K filing and review of financial statements included in the Companys Form 10-Q filings.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The amount also includes other services that are normally provided by KPMG in connection with statutory and regulatory filings or engagements and, for 2015, audit services related to the acquisition of Cheminova A/S.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (2) Fees for services performed by KPMG that are reasonably related to the performance of the audit or review of the Companys financial statements.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This includes employee benefit and compensation plan audits, as well as audit related services in connection with attestations by KPMG that are required by statute or regulation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (3) Fees for professional services performed by KPMG with respect to tax compliance, tax advice and tax planning.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This includes preparation of original and amended tax returns for the Company and its consolidated subsidiaries, refund claims, payment planning, and tax audit assistance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (4) Fees for other permissible work performed by KPMG that does not fall within the categories set forth above.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For the years listed above, this work consists of tax filings for individual employees involved in the Companys expatriate program.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: FMC CORPORATION - Notice of Annual Meeting of Stockholders and Proxy Statement     7
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Back to Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Pre-Approval of Independent Registered Public Accounting Firm Services
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee has adopted a Pre-Approval Policy with respect to audit and non-audit services performed by its independent registered public accounting firm.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The following is a summary of the Policy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Prior to the commencement of services for a given year, the Audit Committee will grant pre-approvals of expected services and estimated fees, as presented by the independent registered public accounting firm.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The independent registered public accounting firm will routinely update the Committee during the year in which the services are performed as to the actual services provided and related fees pursuant to the Pre-Approval Policy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Unexpected services or services for which the fees to be incurred would exceed pre-approved amounts, will require specific approval before the services may be rendered.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Requests or applications to provide such services that require specific approval by the Audit Committee will be submitted to the Chairman of the Audit Committee and to the Companys Chief Financial Officer or his designee by the independent registered public accounting firm.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The request or application must include a statement as to whether, in the view of both the independent registered public accounting firm and the Chief Financial Officer or his designee, such request or application is consistent with the rules of the Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) regarding auditor independence.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Authority to grant approval for such services has been delegated to the Chairman of the Audit Committee, provided that any such approval would then be reviewed by the full Committee at the next regularly scheduled meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee has determined that the independence of KPMG has not been adversely impacted as a result of the non-audit services performed by such accounting firm.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We expect a representative of KPMG to attend the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The representative will have an opportunity to make a statement if he or she desires and also wi be available to respond to appropriate questions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board of Directors recommends a vote FOR ratification of the appointment of KPMG LLP as the Companys independent registered public accounting firm for 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proposal 3 Advisory (Non-Binding) Vote on Executive Compensation
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In accordance with the requirements of Section 14A of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 (the Exchange Act) and the related rules of the SEC, our Board of Directors is submitting a Say on Pay proposal to our stockholders for consideration.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This proposal provides our stockholders the opportunity to cast a non-binding advisory vote on the executive compensation paid to the Companys executive officers named in this proxy statement (named executive officers or NEOs).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This advisory vote on executive compensation is non-binding on the Board, will not overrule any decision by the Board and does not compel the Board to take any action.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: However, the Board and the Compensation and Organization Committee may consider the outcome of the vote when considering future executive compensation decisions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Specifically, to the extent there is any significant vote against the named executive officer compensation as disclosed in this proxy statement, the Board will consider our stockholders concerns and the Compensation and Organization Committee will evaluate whether any actions are necessary to address those concerns.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board and the Compensation and Organization Committee believe that the Companys executive compensation programs and policies and the compensation decisions for 2017 described in this proxy statement
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) support the Companys business objectives,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) link the interests of the executive officers and stockholders,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (iii) align NEO pay with individual and the Companys performance, without encouraging excessive risk-taking that could have a material adverse effect on the Company,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (iv) provide NEOs with a competitive level of compensation and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (v) promote retention of the NEOs and other senior leaders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In 2016, 45.73% of the shares voting approved the executive compensation discussed and disclosed in the Compensation Discussion and Analysis, the Summary Compensation Table and other related tabular and narrative disclosures contained in the 2016 Proxy Statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For the reasons discussed above (and further amplified in the compensation disclosures made in this proxy statement), the Board recommends that stockholders vote in favor of the following resolution:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: RESOLVED that the stockholders approve, on an advisory basis, the compensation of the Companys named executive officers, as disclosed pursuant to th compensation disclosure rules of the Securities and Exchange Commission (which disclosure includes the Compensation Discussion and Analysis, the Summary Compensation Table and other related tabular and narrative disclosures set forth in this proxy statement).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board of Directors recommends a vote FOR the above resolution.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: FMC CORPORATION - Notice of Annual Meeting of Stockholders and Proxy Statement     8
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Back to Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proposal 4 Advisory (Non-Binding) Vote on the Frequency of Executive Compensation Voting
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In accordance with the requirements of the Exchange Act and the related rules of the SEC, our stockholders have the opportunity to indicate how frequently we should seek an advisory vote on the compensation of our named executive officers, as disclosed pursuant to the SECs compensation disclosure rules.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: By voting on this Proposal 4, stockholders may indicate whether they would prefer an advisory vote on named executive officer compensation every one, two or three calendar years.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our stockholders voted on a similar proposal in 2011 with the majority voting to hold the say-on-pay vote every year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We continue to believe that say-on-pay votes should be conducted every year so that our stockholders may annually express their views on our executive compensation program.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Accordingly, the Board recommends that stockholders vote in favor of the following resolution:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: RESOLVED that the Company hold a stockholder advisory vote to approve the compensation of the Companys named executive officers, as disclosed pursuant to the compensation disclosure rules of the Securities and Exchange Commission, with a frequency of once every one year, two years or three years, whichever receives the affirmative vote of the majority of the shares present in person or represented by proxy and entitled to vote at the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may cast your vote on your preferred voting frequency by choosing the option of one year, two years, three years, or abstain from voting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Because this vote is advisory and not binding on the Board or the Company in any way, the Board may decide that it is in the best interests of our stockholders and the Company to hold an advisory vote on executive compensation more or less frequently than the option approved by our stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board of Directors unanimously recommends a vote FOR an advisory vote on executive compensation once every calendar year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proposal 5 Approval of Amendment and Restatement of the FMC Corporation Incentive Compensation and Stock Plan
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: At its meeting held on February 28, 2017, the Board of Directors adopted a resolution approving an amendment and restatement of the FMC Corporation Incentive Compensation and Stock Plan (the Plan) and directing that such amendment and restatement be submitted to the stockholders for their approval at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As a successor to prior plans dating back to 1995, the Plan provides for the grant of cash and equity-based awards to closely link the long-term financial rewards of the recipient with increases in Company stockholder value.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board continues to believe that stock-based incentives are important factors in attracting, retaining and rewarding officers, employees, directors and consultants and closely aligning their financial interests with those of the Companys stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board believes that the capacity added by the proposed amendment and restatement will enhance the Companys ability to attract and retain effective and capable officers, employees, directors and consultants who will add to the continued growth and success of the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The proposed amendment and restatement of the Plan (Restatement), summarized below, will make 1,250,000 additional shares available for issuance while implementing a number of best practices that protect stockholder interest.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Summary of Modifications to Plan
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Conservative Request for Additional Shares
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Restatement seeks to make an additional 1,250,000 shares available for issuance under the Plan, bringing the total number of available shares to approximately 5,584,000.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We anticipate that this will be sufficient to cover all grants made over the next three to four years, which are necessary in order to attract and retain talented executives.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Once the increased share reserve is exhausted, we will again need to seek stockholder approval to authorize more shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Requesting stockholder approval for only a limited number of shares at a given time means that stockholders will have the chance to weigh in regularly on our incentive compensation program.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Prohibition on Liberal Share Recycling
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Plan no longer allows liberal share recycling.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: By prohibiting liberal share recycling, stockholders will have a better sense of the size of the awards we are issuing and how many shares we have left in the share pool at any given time.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: FMC CORPORATION - Notice of Annual Meeting of Stockholders and Proxy Statement      9
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Back to Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Fungible Share Pool
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Previously, the Plan limited the number of shares that could be granted as full-value awards and those that could be granted as stock options or stock appreciation rights (SARs).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Restatement introduces a fungible share pool with no such restrictions to give the Committee greater flexibility in determining the right mix of equity awards to incentivize participants.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: However, to the extent the Committee uses the share pool to grant more valuable awards, the share pool will be depleted quicker.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each full value share grant will reduce the share pool by two shares, while each option grant will reduce the pool by one share.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Expanded Performance Metrics and More Robust Annual Award Limits
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Section 162(m) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986, as amended (the Code) limits the extent to which a public companys compensation to executives is deductible, with an exception for qualified performance-based compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In order to designate awards as qualified performance-based compensation, the Company must establish performance metrics and impose annual award limits.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We have expanded the performance metrics that can be used for this purpose, as discussed in the section of this proxy statement entitled Approval of Amendment and Restatement of the FMC Corporation Incentive Compensation and Stock Plan Summary of Plan ProvisionsPerformance Metrics.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, we have clarified in the Restatement annual caps for awards that may qualify as performance-based compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: First, a participant may not receive stock options and SARs covering more than 500,000 shares of Common Stock in any year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Second, a participant may not receive awards of restricted stock units (RSUs) or restricted stock with respect to more than 500,000 shares of Common Stock in any year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Third, a participant may not be paid more than eleven million dollars in any year in respect of management incentive awards.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Additional Award Limits for Non-Employee Directors
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Restatement caps awards granted to non-employee directors (in their capacity as such) at $500,000 annually, based on the grant-date fair value of the awards, as measured for accounting purposes.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This limit on non-employee director awards excludes awards made to a non-executive chairman of the Board in that capacity.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Minimum Vesting Requirements
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee historically imposed a minimum vesting period of at least twelve months on most awards through individual award agreements, in order to promote he retention of executives and directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In line with best practices, the Restatement hardwires a minimum vesting requirement into the Plan so that awards granted will vest no sooner than twelve months following grant.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Nonetheless, in order to maintain the flexibility to make special or one-time grants with shorter vesting periods in limited instances, the Committee retains the right to waive minimum vesting requirements with respect to a small percentage of awards (five percent of shares available for issuance and five percent of shares that again became available for issuance in the event of an awards forfeiture, cancellation or expiration).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: No Automatic Acceleration upon a Change in Control
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Restatement reflects the Companys current practice not to provide for automatic acceleration of vesting of awards on a change in control.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Rather, we believe that it is important for the Committee to maintain flexibility as to the proper treatment of awards upon a change in control, so the Plan leaves this to the Committees judgment.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In practice, we have entered into agreements with our NEOs that generally provide that awards only vest on an accelerated basis upon a change in control if the NEO also experiences a severance event (so-called double trigger arrangements).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Express Prohibition on Option and SAR Repricing
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Restatement expressly prohibits the Company from cashing out underwater options or SARs without stockholder approval.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Previously, the Plan had prohibited the Committee from repricing a stock option without stockholder approval by
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (a) reducing its exercise price after the grant date or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (b) canceling the option and replacing it with an option with a lower exercise price.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Restatement extends both of these prohibitions to SARs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, it prohibits the Committee from, without stockholder approval, making a cash payment to a participant in exchange for his or her agreement to cancel a stock option or SAR where the exercise price is greater than the current fair market value.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Summary of Plan Provisions
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The principal provisions of the Plan are summarized below.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This summary is qualified in its entirety by reference to the actual Plan as revised by the Restatement proposed in this proxy statement, a copy of which is attached to the electronic copy of this proxy statement filed with the Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) and may be accessed from the SECs home page (www.sec.gov) or the Investor Relations link of FMCs website (www.fmc.com).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, a copy of the Plan may be obtained upon written request to: Corporate Secretary, FMC Corporation, FMC Tower at Cira Centre South, 2929 Walnut Street, Philadelphia, PA, 19104.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Administration
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Plan vests broad powers in a committee to administer and interpret the Plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Currently, that committee is the Compensation and Organization Committee of the Board of Directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Except when limited by the terms of the Plan, the Committee has the authority to, among other things: select the persons to be granted awards; determine the type, size and term of awards; determine the time when awards will be granted and any conditions for receiving awards; establish performance objectives and conditions for earning awards; determine
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: FMC CORPORATION - Notice of Annual Meeting of Stockholders and Proxy Statement     10
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Back to Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: whether such performance objectives and conditions have been met; amend the plan at any time; and determine when awards may be settled in cash, stock or a combination of the two.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under Delaware Law, the Committee may delegate to officers of the Company the authority to grant awards to employees who are not executive officers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In those cases, any references to the Committee will also include the delegated officers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under the Plan, the Committee has discretion in making adjustments to outstanding awards; provided, however, that without stockholder approval, the Committee is not permitted to increase the number of shares of Common Stock available for issuance under the Plan or to reprice a previously granted stock option or SAR whose exercise price is higher than the current fair market value of a share.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The prohibition on repricing without stockholder approval includes: reducing the instruments exercise price, replacing it with an instrument that has a lower exercise price or making a cash payment to the participant in exchange for his or her cancellation of the instrument.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Nevertheless, the Plan specifically provides the Committee with discretion to make equitable adjustments or substitutions with respect to the number, kind and price of shares subject to outstanding awards and to the number of shares available for issuance under the Plan in the event of certain corporate events or transactions, including, but not limited to, stock splits, mergers, consolidations, separations, including spin-offs or other distribution of stock or property of FMC, reorganization, or liquidation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Plan is not a tax-qualified deferred compensation plan under Section 401(a) of the Code and is not subject to the provisions of the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974, as amended.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Types of Awards
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Plan provides for the grant of five basic types of awards to key participants selected by the Committee:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) stock options,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) restricted stock,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (iii) RSUs,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (iv) SARs, and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (v) management incentive awards, which are payable in cash.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee may designate awards of restricted stock, RSUs or management incentive awards as qualified performance-based awards, which will vest only if the Committee certifies that pre-determined performance goals have been achieved.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, the Plan gives the Committee discretion to craft other types of awards as it deems appropriate.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stock Options
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Plan allows for the grant of stock options, which may be incentive stock options within the meaning of Section 422 of the Code or nonqualified stock options.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stock options must have an exercise price of no less than 100 percent of the fair market value of a share of Common Stock on the date of grant.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The option exercise price is payable in cash or, with the consent of the Committee, in the form of shares of Common Stock, through a net cashless exercise of the option (which involves the cancellation of a portion of the option to cover the cost of exercising the balance of the option), or through a loan made by a broker.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If a participant neglects to exercise an in-the-money option by the end of the term, then immediately before the option expires, it will be automatically exercised through a net cashless exercise.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: An in-the-money option is an option with an exercise price that is lower than the then-fair market value of a share of Common Stock.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Restricted Stock
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Plan allows for the grant of shares of restricted stock.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: An award of restricted stock is a grant of outstanding shares of Common Stock which are subject to vesting conditions and transfer restrictions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Generally, shares of restricted stock that are not vested at the time of an employees termination of employment will be forfeited.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Restricted Stock Units
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Plan allows for the grant of RSUs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: RSUs represent a right to receive from the Company, following fulfillment of applicable vesting conditions, either a specified number of shares of Common Stock or a cash payment equal to the market value (at the time of the distribution) of a specified number of shares of Common Stock.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Whether RSUs are payable in Common Stock and/or cash is determined by the Committee in its discretion.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Generally, RSUs that are not vested at the time of an employees termination of employment will be forfeited.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: SARs
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Plan allows for the grant of SARs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A SAR represents the right to receive any appreciation in a share of Common Stock over a particular time period.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These awards are intended to mirror the benefit the employee would have received if the Committee granted the employee a stock option.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Management Incentive Awards
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Plan allows for the grant of management incentive awards.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Management incentive awards represent the right to receive a specified amount of cash upon the achievement of performance goals approved by the Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We grant these awards under our Annual Incentive program, described in more detail in the section in this proxy statement entitled Compensation Discussion and AnalysisComponents of Executive CompensationAnnual Incentive.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Eligibility
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Key employees, directors and consultants of FMC and its divisions, subsidiaries and affiliates (including partnerships, joint ventures or other entities in which FMC has a substantial investment) are eligible to be granted awards under the Plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As of February 28, 2017, approximately 200 people were eligible to participate in the Plan, including the Companys ten non-employee directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee selects participants from this pool of eligible individuals.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Expiration of Awards
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Options and SARs typically expire ten years after grant, or earlier if the participant terminates employment before that time, unless otherwise provided in a participants award agreement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Vesting
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee determines the vesting conditions for awards.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A time-based condition requires that the participant be employed or otherwise in the service of the Company for a certain amount of time in order for the award to vest.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Equity awards granted under the Plan must have a minimum vesting period of twelve months.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: However,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: FMC CORPORATION - Notice of Annual Meeting of Stockholders and Proxy Statement      11
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Back to Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: the Committee has discretion to vest a small number of equity awards sooner than twelve months: five percent of the shares available for issuance on April 25, 2017, and five percent of the shares that again became available for issuance in the event of an awards forfeiture, cancellation, or expiration.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A performance-based condition requires that certain performance criteria be achieved in order for the award to vest.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For a discussion of the performance-based vesting criteria the Committee may impose upon an award, see the section of this proxy statement entitled Approval of Amendment and Restatement of the FMC Corporation Incentive Compensation and Stock PlanSummary of Plan ProvisionsPerformance Metrics.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shares of Stock Available for Issuance
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As of February 28, 2017, 3,766,000 shares remained available for future awards under the Plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The number of shares purchasable under all outstanding vested and unvested options granted under the Plan was 2,990,000.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The number of shares underlying all outstanding RSUs under the Plan was 1,019,000, assuming all RSUs were settled at the highest return rate.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Restatement seeks stockholder approval to authorize an additional 1,250,000 shares for issuance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee may utilize any of these shares toward the grant of any type of award under the Plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If a stock option or SAR is granted, each share of stock underlying the award will deplete the available pool by one share.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: However, if any other type of award is granted, each share of stock underlying the award will deplete the available pool by two shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: On February 28, 2017, the closing price per share of the Common Stock on the NYSE was $57.62.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Award Limits
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In a particular calendar year, no participant may
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (a) receive stock option and SAR awards covering more than 500,000 shares of Common Stock,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (b) receive RSU or restricted stock awards with respect to more than 500,000 shares of Common Stock, or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (c) be paid more than eleven million dollars in respect of management incentive awards.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: No non-employee director may receive, in his or her capacity as a non-employee director, awards in any calendar year that exceed $500,000 in grant-date fair value, as measured for accounting purposes.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This limit on non-employee director awards excludes awards made to a non-executive chairman of the Board in that capacity.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Performance Metrics
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The following are performance metrics that the Committee may utilize in order to designate awards as qualified performance-based compensation:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) the attainment of certain target levels of, or a specified percentage increase in, net sales, unit sales, revenues, market share, earnings, operating earnings, income before income taxes, net income, pretax income before allocation of corporate overhead and bonus, earnings before income tax, earnings before interest and taxes and earnings before interest, taxes, gross margins, depreciation and amortization, or a combination of any or all of the foregoing;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) the attainment of certain target levels of, or a percentage increase in, after-tax or pre-tax profits including that attributable to continuing and/or other operations;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (iii) the attainment of certain target levels of, or a specified increase in, cash outflow or operational cash flow;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (iv) the achievement of a certain level of, reduction of, or other specified objectives with regard to limiting the level of increase in, all or a portion of, the Companys bank debt or other long-term or short-term public or private debt or other similar financial obligations of the Company, which may be calculated net of such cash balances and/or other offsets and adjustments as may be established by the Committee;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (v) the attainment of a specified level of, or specified percentage increase in, earnings per share or earnings per share from continuing operations;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (vi) the attainment of certain target levels of, or a specified increase in, return on capital employed or return on invested capital or assets;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (vii) the attainment of certain target levels of, or a percentage increase in, after-tax or pre-tax return on stockholders equity or total shareholder return;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (viii) the attainment of certain target levels of, or a specified increase in, economic value added targets based on a cash flow return on investment formula;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ix) the growth in the value of an investment in the shares of Common Stock assuming the reinvestment of dividends;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (x) the attainment of a specified level of, or specified percentage rate of change in, all or certain costs, inventory, assets (specified or total) and/or working capital; and/ or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (xi) the attainment of a specified level of, or specified percentage rate of change in, customer satisfaction, employee satisfaction, diversity, and/or retention.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These performance metrics may be measured on a consolidated basis, or only with respect to certain entities, divisions or operational units.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, they may be measured in absolute terms, relative to prior periods, and/or relative to the performance of other peer companies or indices selected by the Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If applicable, the performance metrics may be measured on an aggregate or per share basis.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee may adjust these performance metrics to exclude the effects (either on a before or after-tax basis) of any one or more of:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) extraordinary items (meaning all items determined to be extraordinary or unusual in nature or infrequent in occurrence or related to a corporate transaction (including a disposition or acquisition) or related to a change in accounting principles, all as determined in accordance with standards established by the Accounting Principles Board),
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) business restructurings, discontinued operations, non-operating pension and post-retirement charges, changes in foreign currency exchange rates, changes in estimates of tax matters related to prior years, changes in the realizability of deferred tax assets, changes in laws or regulations, or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (iii) to the extent consistent with any applicable requirements of Section 162(m) of the Code, such other items specified by the Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These adjustments may be applied on a consolidated basis, or only with respect to certain entities, divisions or operational units.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Recycling of Shares
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Liberal share recycling is prohibited under the Plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If a stock option or SAR is exercised, the full number of shares subject to the exercise will count against the number of shares remaining available for issuance under the Plan and cannot be recycled back into the available pool of shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This is the case even if the participant satisfied the option price of the stock through a net cashless exercise of the option (cancellation of a portion of the option to cover the cost of exercising the balance of the option) or by delivering shares to the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Similarly, even if the Company delivered a net number of shares to a participant upon exercise of a SAR, the full number of shares subject to that SAR will count against the number of shares remaining for issuance under the Plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shares withheld to satisfy tax withholding requirements, and shares repurchased on the open market by the Company using proceeds from the exercise of a stock option, will also count against the number of shares remaining for issuance under the Plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Share recycling is permitted in the limited circumstance when an award is forfeited, cancelled or has expired.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The shares subject to such an award will become available again for issuance under the Plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each full value grant of such shares will reduce the share pool by two shares, while each option grant will reduce the pool by one share.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Federal Tax Consequences
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under the Code as currently in effect, a grant under the Plan of stock options, SARs, restricted stock or RSUs would have no federal income tax consequence at the time of grant.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All amounts taxable as ordinary income to participants under the Plan in respect of awards are expected to be deductible by FMC as compensation at the same time the participant recognizes the ordinary income, subject to the limitations of Section 162(m) of the Code.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Options and SARs
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Upon exercise of a nonqualified stock option, the excess of the fair market value of the stock at the date of exercise over the exercise price is taxable to a participant as ordinary income.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Similarly, upon exercise of a SAR, the value of the shares or cash received is taxable to the participant as ordinary income.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Upon exercise of an incentive stock option that a participant has held for at least two years after the date of grant and at least one year after the date of exercise, the participant will not have taxable income, except that alternative minimum tax may apply.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: When there is a disposition of the shares subject to the incentive stock option, the difference, if any, between the sale price of the shares and the exercise price of the option, is treated as long-term capital gain or loss.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If the participant does not satisfy these holding period requirements, a disqualifying disposition occurs and the participant will recognize ordinary income in the year of the disposition in an amount equal to the excess of the fair market value of the shares at the time the option was exercised over the exercise price of the option.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Any gain realized in excess of the fair market value at the time of exercise will be short or long-term capital gain, depending on whether the shares were sold more than one year after the option was exercised.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Restricted Stock
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Unless the participant elects to recognize its value as income at the time of the grant, restricted stock is taxable to a participant as ordinary income when it becomes vested.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: RSUs
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: When shares of Common Stock or cash with respect to RSU awards are delivered to the participant, the value of the shares or cash is taxable to the participant as ordinary income.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Delivery of shares or cash to participants under RSUs occurs either upon vesting or upon conclusion of any applicable deferral period, such as upon retirement from (or other termination of service on) the Board of Directors in the case of RSUs granted to Board members.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Adjustments
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee may adjust the awards of any participant or performance measures.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To the extent that the exercise of such discretion subjects FMC to the limitation on its tax deduction of a participants compensation as set forth in Section 162(m) of the Code, the Committee believes that it is in the best interest of FMC and its stockholders to preserve the Committees authority to so act and that, in any event, such limitation should not have a material effect on FMCs tax liability or earnings.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Change in Control
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In the event of a change in control of the Company, there is no automatic acceleration of the vesting of awards granted under the Plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To the extent a participants award agreement does not provide for particular treatment upon a change in control, the Committee will have discretion as to how to treat the awards.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee may make substitutions, adjustments or settlements of outstanding awards in its discretion upon a change in control, subject to applicable law.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee may cancel any outstanding vested stock options or SARs that have not been exercised prior to the change in control, irrespective of the terms set forth elsewhere in the Restatement or in a participants award agreement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Upon a change in control, the Committee may terminate the award cycle early for any outstanding management incentive awards.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The participant will receive the greater of
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (a) an amount equal to what he or she would have earned had the Company achieved target performance at the end of the full award cycle, pro-rated to reflect the portion of the award cycle that elapsed prior to the change in control, or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (b) the amount that he or she otherwise would have earned based on the actual achievement of any performance goals prior to the change in control, unless the Committee determines otherwise.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Clawback
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The awards are subject to recoupment by the Company if a participant engages in serious misconduct or if otherwise required by the Companys clawback policy.

sentences.text: Principal Occupation: President, CEO and Chairman, FMC Corporation Age: 59 Director Since: 2010

sentences.text: Mr. Brondeau was elected Chairman of the Company in October 2010.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Before joining the Company as President and Chief Executive Officer in January 2010, Mr. Brondeau served as President and Chief Executive Officer, Dow Advanced Materials Division, until his retirement in September 2009.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Prior to Dows acquisition of Rohm and Haas Company in April 2009, he was President and Chief Operating Officer of Rohm and Haas from May 2008.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Brondeau held numerous executive positions during his tenure at Rohm and Haas from 1989 through May 2008.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: He is also a member of the Board of Directors of TE Connectivity.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Brondeaus current role as President, CEO and Chairman of the Company and his former senior executive positions in the chemical industry make him an important contributor to the Board.

sentences.text: Eduardo E. Cordeiro
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Principal Occupation: Executive Vice President, Chief Financial Officer, and President, Americas Region, of Cabot Corporation, a global specialty chemicals and performance materials company Age: 49
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Cordeiro has served as Executive Vice President and Chief Financial Officer of Cabot Corporation since 2009.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In 2014 he was also appointed President, Americas Region.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: He joined Cabot in 1998 and has held several corporate, business and executive management positions including General Manager of Cabots Fumed Metal Oxides and Tantalum businesses and Vice President of Corporate Strategy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Prior to joining Cabot, Mr. Cordeiro was a consultant with The Boston Consulting Group and a founding partner of The Economics Resource Group.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Cordeiro brings extensive strategy, finance and chemical industry experience to the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: He has developed corporate strategy experience working for The Boston Consulting Group and more specifically chemical industry strategy experience leading Cabots corporate strategy function for the last several years.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: He also brings deep financial experience having held multiple finance roles at Cabot over the last 15 years, including, most recently, the CFO position.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Cordeiro also brings operational and chemical industry business experience to the Board having been General Manager for two of Cabots core specialty chemical businesses.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Principal Occupation: Managing Director and member of the Board of Directors of Ascend Performance Materials Holdings, Inc., a producer of Nylon 66 and related chemicals
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. DAloia has served as Managing Director and a member of the Board of Directors of Ascend Performance Materials Holdings, Inc. since June 1, 2009.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: From February 2000 until June 2008, Mr. DAloia served as Senior Vice President and Chief Financial Officer of Trane, Inc. (formerly American Standard Companies, Inc.).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Prior to that, he was employed by Honeywell (formerly AlliedSignal Inc.), a diversified industrial company, most recently serving as Vice President-Strategic Planning and Business Development.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: He spent 28 years with AlliedSignal Inc. in diverse management positions, including Vice President-Taxes, Vice President and Treasurer, Vice President and Controller, and Vice President and Chief Financial Officer for the Engineered Materials sector.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: He is a member of the Boards of Directors of ITT Corporation and Wabco, Inc.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. DAloias significant financial and business experience resulting from senior executive and financial roles in large manufacturing operations, and service as a director of other public companies, make him eminently qualified to be a director of the Company and to serve as a financial expert on the Audit Committee.

sentences.text: IV.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: INFORMATION ABOUT THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS AND CORPORATE GOVERNANCE
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Meetings
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: During 2016, the Board of Directors held five regular meetings and one telephonic meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All incumbent directors attended at least 75% of the total number of meetings of the Board and all Committees on which they served.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Committees and Independence of Directors
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board of Directors has five standing Committees: an Audit Committee, a Compensation and Organization Committee, a Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee, an Executive Committee and a Sustainability Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee, Compensation and Organization Committee, and Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee are all composed of non-employee directors, each of whom has been determined by the Board to be independent on the basis set forth below.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: With the exception of the Chief Executive Officer, Mr. Brondeau, no director or nominee is currently, or was within the past three years, employed by the Company, its subsidiaries or affiliates.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board has affirmatively determined that none of the non-employee directors has any material business, family or other relationship with the Company, its subsidiaries or affiliates other than as a director, and that they all qualify as independent.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Specifically, the independent directors are Messrs. Cordeiro, DAloia, Greer, Kempthorne, Norris, Pallash, Powell and Volpe, Ms. Johnson and Ms. vrum.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In order to be considered independent by the Board, a director or nominee must meet the requirements set forth in the SEC and New York Stock Exchange (NYSE) rules regarding independence.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Cordeiro is an executive officer of Cabot Corporation, a business that has engaged in transactions with the Company in the past year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board has determined that none of these transactions, individually or in the aggregate, were material to the Company or the other entity, and that Mr. Cordeiro does not have a material interest in the transactions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Furthermore, the Board noted that that the transaction amounts fall below the thresholds established by the NYSE for determining independence.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: FMCs purchases from Cabot Corporation were $49,325.14 in 2016; there were no FMC sales to Cabot Corporation in 2016; and there were no sales or purchases in 2014 or 2015.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: On the basis of its evaluation, the Board has concluded that Mr. Cordeiro meets the independence standards applied by the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Audit Committee
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board of Directors has adopted a written charter that outlines the duties of the Audit Committee, including conducting an annual self-assessment.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A current copy of the Charter is posted on the Companys website, as described in the section below entitled Corporate Governance Documents.

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Review the effectiveness and adequacy of the Companys internal controls
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Review the annual report, proxy statement and periodic SEC filings such as the Companys reports on Form 10K and 10Q, including Managements Discussion and Analysis, and ensure that the Companys financial reports fairly represent its operations
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Review the effectiveness, scope and performance of activities of the independent registered public accounting firm and the internal auditor function
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Review significant changes in accounting policies
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Select the independent registered public accounting firm and confirm its independence
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Review potentially significant litigation
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Review federal income tax issues
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Review the Companys policies with respect to risk assessment and risk management
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Director Who Presides Over Executive Sessions
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In accordance with the FMC Corporation Statement of Governance Principles, Policies and Procedures, the non-employee members of the Board of Directors meet in regularly scheduled executive sessions without management.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Lead Director, Mr. DAloia, presides over these sessions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: See the section below entitled Board Leadership Structure for additional information regarding the role of the Lead Director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, see the section below entitled Communicating with the Board for procedures for communicating with the Lead Director.

sentences.text: Director Compensation
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Compensation Policy
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Company maintains the FMC Corporation Non-Employee Directors Compensation Policy to provide for the compensation described below.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee is responsible for reviewing and approving director compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Competitive market data on director pay levels and design practices are prepared by and reviewed with the Companys consultant, Aon Hewitt.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Non-Employee Directors Compensation Policy is not applicable to directors who are also employees of the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Accordingly, Mr. Brondeau received no additional compensation for his service as a director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For a description of the compensation paid to Mr. Brondeau for his service during 2016 as our CEO, see below under the heading Executive Compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Retainer and Fees
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Currently, each non-employee director is paid an annual retainer of $100,000 or a pro-rata amount for any portion of a year served.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The retainer is paid in quarterly installments in cash, or, at his/her election, the director may be compensated in additional restricted stock units.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Restricted stock units paid in respect of the annual retainer are subject to forfeiture on a pro-rata basis if the director does not serve for the full year in respect of which the retainer is paid.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The forfeiture condition is waived in the event of a change in control of the Company or if the directors service ceases due to his or her death or disability.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each director who chairs a Committee is paid an additional $10,000 per year except the Chairman of the Audit Committee and the Chairman of the Compensation and Organization Committee, each of whom is paid an additional $15,000 per year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Audit Committee members also receive an additional $5,000 annual retainer.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Lead Director is paid an additional $25,000 annual retainer.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: On May 1, 2017 the Audit Committee Chairmans fee will be raised to $20,000.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Annual Grant of Restricted Stock Units
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Currently, each non-employee director also receives an annual grant of restricted stock units having a value of $130,000 on the date of grant.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These restricted stock units vest at the Annual Meeting of Stockholders held in the year following the date of grant or, if sooner, upon a change in control of the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, these restricted stock units will vest on a pro-rata basis if the director dies before the Annual Meeting at which the units would have otherwise vested.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Payment of Vested Restricted Stock Units
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A director is permitted to specify, prior to the year in which the restricted stock units are credited, the date upon which he or she wishes to receive payment in Common Stock of the fully vested restricted stock units.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The directors ability to sell any distributed shares remains subject to the restrictions of the Companys Director Stock Ownership Policy, which policy is described below.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Other Compensation
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Non-employee directors receive dividend equivalent rights on all restricted stock units awarded as part of their annual retainers and on any vested restricted stock units awarded as an annual grant.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Such dividend equivalent rights are credited in the form of additional restricted stock units equal in value to the cash dividends paid to stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: No other remuneration is paid to non-employee directors for services as a director of the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Non-employee directors do not participate in the Companys nonqualified deferred compensation plan or employee benefit plans, including, but not limited to, the qualified and nonqualified pension plans.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Company supports the charitable donations of directors under its matching gifts plan that provides a dollar-for-dollar match of gifts up to $15,000 per year to certain educational institutions, arts and cultural organizations, and conservation and civic organizations.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Director Stock Ownership Policy
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Company has established guidelines setting expectations for the ownership of Company stock by directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Director Stock Ownership Policy requires that directors hold a minimum of five times the value of the annual retainer, or $500,000.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For this purpose, undistributed shares underlying restricted stock units (both vested and non-vested) are considered held by a director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Directors are not permitted to sell shares of Company stock, other than to satisfy tax liabilities triggered by Company equity grants, until they are within five years from mandatory retirement .
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If they have less than five years until mandatory retirement but at least four years, they may sell up to 20% of their shares of Company stock in excess of the $500,000 threshold (their excess shares).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If they have less than four years until mandatory retirement but at least three years, they may sell up to 40% of the excess shares they then hold.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If they have less than three years until mandatory retirement but at least two years, they may sell up to 60% of the excess shares they then hold.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Finally, if they have less than two years until mandatory retirement, they may sell any excess shares they then hold.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The policy ceases to apply to a director once he or she ceases to serve as a director, and exceptions may be granted by the disinterested members of the Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee on a case by case basis.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Communicating with the Board
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stockholders and any interested parties may communicate with the Board of Directors, the Lead Director, or any individual member of the Board as follows: Communications must be in writing, sent care of the Corporate Secretary, FMC Corporation, FMC Tower at Cira Centre South, 2929 Walnut Street, Philadelphia, PA 19104.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All communications with the Board, the Lead Director or any individual director will be delivered as addressed.
