sentences.text: Section 16(a) Beneficial Ownership Reporting Compliance
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Section 16(a) of the Exchange Act requires the Companys directors and executive officers, and persons who own more than ten percent of the Companys Common Stock, to file with the SEC initial reports of ownership and reports of changes in beneficial ownership of Common Stock.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Executive officers, directors and greater than ten percent stockholders (collectively, the Reporting Persons) are additionally required to furnish the Company with copies of all Section 16(a) forms they file.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Based on a review of forms filed with the SEC and information provided by Reporting Persons to the Company, it is believed that all Section 16(a) requirements were fully met by all Reporting Persons with respect to the year ended December 31, 2016, except that for each of Mr. Eduardo E. Cordeiro, Mr. G. Peter DAloia, Mr. C. Scott Greer, Ms. KLynne Johnson, Mr. Dirk A. Kempthorne, Mr. Paul J. Norris, Mr. Robert C. Pallash, Mr. William H. Powell and Mr. Vincent R. Volpe, Jr., one report was filed one day late with respect to one compensatory equity grant, and Ms. Utecht filed one report late relating to two charitable gifts.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Audit Committee Report
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee Report that follows shall not be deemed to be incorporated by reference into any filing made by the Company under the Securities Act of 1933 or the Exchange Act, notwithstanding any general statement contained in any such filing incorporating this proxy statement by reference, except to the extent the Company incorporates such Report by specific reference.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: During the past year, the Audit Committee met six times, including telephonic meetings, to discuss quarterly results and other matters.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In carrying out its duties, the Committee has:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Reviewed and discussed the audited consolidated financial statements with management and KPMG, the companys independent registered public accounting firm;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Discussed with KPMG the matters required to be discussed pursuant to the Public Company Accounting Oversight Board Auditing Standard No. 16, Communicating with Audit Committee;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Discussed various matters with KPMG related to the Companys consolidated financial statements, including all critical accounting policies and practices used, all alternative treatments for material items that have been discussed with Company management, and all other material written communications between KPMG and management; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Received the written disclosures and the letter from KPMG as required by The Public Company Accounting Oversight Board, and has confirmed with KPMG its independence.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In reliance upon the review and discussions referred to above, the Audit Committee recommended to the Board of Directors that the audited financial statements be included in the Companys Annual Report on Form 10-K for the year ended December 31, 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The preceding report has been furnished by the following members of the Audit Committee:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Expenses Relating to this Proxy Solicitation
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Company will pay all expenses relating to this proxy solicitation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition to this solicitation by mail, Company officers, directors and employees may solicit proxies by telephone or personal call without extra compensation for that activity.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Company also expects to reimburse banks, brokers and other persons for reasonable out-of-pocket expenses in forwarding proxy material to beneficial owners of Company stock and obtaining the proxies of those owners.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN
